title: Urgently looking for a typface
content:
Hello everyone,  
Please can someone help me to find the typeface of the logo attached. This is very urgent!  
Hope to hear the good news!  
Many thanks.  
Pat

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-07-05 at 3.07.58 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817025051/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-07-05%20at%203.07.58%20PM.png) | 8.61 KB |
author: patrikk

comments.content: I looked for it, and had no matches... It doesn't look like a font to me... It looks more like it was hand made for a specific brand. Good Luck.

I certainly hope it's not a font...

hhp
i'd say Busorama could be deconstructed just enough to make this.
Thanks a lot guys for your replies. I have no idea from where the client got this font! Damn it!
